1.content:
Welcome to the Diaper Humiliation Crossover! Where so many will suffer an awful fate!

Today we should start with the media. We will likely give you the option of picking the series, and then you decide how you want things to go! Should it be one main character dealing with this crossover that you’ll focus on? Or a pair of characters you focus on? Or more?!

Or you can do something wild and do a whole crossover story type interactive! The sky’s the limit for humiliation!

So let us begin
1.title: Let Us Begin.

11.content: Ah it is best to focus on one. Ok so what media should be our main focus? Just note you are following this character this whole time from this media.
11.title: Pick one character for this crossover?

“Piplup piplup.” Her penguin Pokémon tells her.

“Calm down? How can I! Nothing can possibly go wrong today!” She laughs. She then looks down and sees their destination. “Look Piplup, Look! There it is!” She ssid, pointing to...
1111311.title: Dawn in smash....Leads to some humiliating results

14.title: Massive world crossover!

141.content:
In this special school, characters, for whatever reason, are actually studying at a distant school away from home. Most will be young for this, but some have taken place as teachers or other staff for the school. But humiliation will still occur as peace never stays! Either the school has weird rules about humiliating other students, or a student just enjoys bullying another, and this suddenly leads to a war!

Only you can decide how this goes. Just leave enough room for others to start a school plot if they desire,
141.title: The special school

info.brief_description: An interactive for crossovers of fictional series based mostly around diaper humiliation.
info.description:
Crossovers between fictional series featuring diaper humiliation. Every character can go around and meet someone from another series, but may be surprised when they find themselves humiliated by that character, humiliated with that character, or escaping humiliation from that character.... ONLY TO BE HUMILIATED BY SOMETHING ELSE!

You will follow them and find ways to put them in such a situation. Heck maybe you don’t even need it to be one character, but pairs of groups! Imagine!

Lots of things can happen here! Imagine Naruto (Naruto) being humiliated by Luffy (one piece), or Usagi (Sailor Moon) and Sakura (Carr Capturer Sakura) being forced into diapers by Samuel Aran(Metroid)! The possibilities are endless!

However I must place my own personal rules here:

1: Fictional media only and no live action stuff, therefore nothing featuring characters that are mostly from live action priorities. This also means no real world people. I will excuse things like comic book movies seeing that they are remembered in comic books and animated series before live action, just try not to use the live action continuity.

2: Some fetishes not allowed: Gore, excessive weight gain(belly may grow but not so big), Muscle growth(unless the series uses it already like dragon ball, but don’t add on to it), TF, and excessive farting(scat is fine tho).

3: OCs were be fine in small to large enough roles. Such as store clerks or being the antagonist (like a bully for example). There will be no oc main character roles AT THIS MOMENT! Like no OC friend we didn’t know about till now, no OC hero who stronger then everyone and is a nicer person anyway. At this moment there will be no OC main characters unless there is enough demand. If you got ideas or questions please message me.

4: Try to fill in enough to make it considered a chapter. I guess a decent starting point for now would be a 100 words unless this is a choice chapter.... That said...
4:5: Please be limited on choice chapters. As I don’t want to see an endless line of choice chapters in the updates unless there is a story at the end.

5: Only other limit is to limit harassment of other creator and to have decent grammar. I have the right to delete chapters, but I likely will warn you unless I think you are trolling or something.
And I’ll say this, with all characters being fictional, sexual themes is fine, all ages can ages above 5 can participant, and you all can please have fun!
